metadata.name: Punycodes Exhibition
metadata.description: On 28 September, 2022 we opened our pop-up gallery with an inaugural show of 10 historical Punycodes 2011-2017, exhibited for the first time IRL in Switzerland. In order to commemorate this celebratory achievement we will be minting 100 NFTs of the Punycodes invite card used for the elementum.art NFT Gallery in Zurich. Here you can access the minting of the Punycode invite NFT card. We hope you will treasure it as much as we will.
